actions.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits the use of any funding to identify by photograph on a department's or agency's website any Member of the House of Representatives or the Senate within 60 days before a federal general election.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to be used to identify by photograph on a department's or agency's website any Member of the House of Representatives or the Senate within 60 days before a federal general election.
